name: Student Management System
desc: Enterprise-grade database management system with 17 GitHub stars. Features 3NF normalized schema, Singleton pattern with dynamic connection pooling (6-8ms queries), and comprehensive Wiki documentation with ER diagrams.

caseStudy.problem: University administration struggled with scattered excel sheets and slow manual data retrieval, leading to administrative bottlenecks.
caseStudy.solution: Built a centralized Java Swing application with a normalized MySQL database, implementing the Singleton pattern for efficient connection management.

process.title: Database Normalization
process.desc: Redesigned schema to 3NF, eliminating data redundancy and improving integrity.

process.title: Performance Tuning
process.desc: Implemented connection pooling to reduce query latency from 50ms to ~7ms.

process.title: UX Design
process.desc: Created intuitive dashboards for both Admins and Students using Guna UI.

name: Spotify Sentiment Analysis
desc: NLP sentiment classifier analyzing 52,702 Spotify user reviews with 85-90% accuracy using MultinomialNB. Complete ML pipeline with TF-IDF vectorization, text preprocessing, and Google Colab integration.

name: Mario's Multiverse Adventure
desc: 2D platformer game with 3 unique levels built for AIUB Computer Graphics course. Features OpenGL rendering, SFML audio, SQLite high scores, physics engine with collision detection. YouTube demo available.

caseStudy.problem: Computer Graphics courses require practical application of theoretical concepts like rendering, physics, and linear algebra in a real-time environment.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a 2D platformer game engine from scratch using OpenGL and C++, demonstrating core graphics programming and game development principles.

process.title: OpenGL Rendering
process.desc: Built a custom rendering engine using OpenGL, GLUT, and GLEW to handle textures, sprites, and animations.

process.title: Physics Engine
process.desc: Implemented collision detection and basic physics mechanics for character movement and environmental interaction.

process.title: Cross-Platform Build
process.desc: Configured CMake and vcpkg to ensure the project builds and runs consistently on Windows and Linux.

name: BD News Scraper & Analytics
desc: Production-grade data engineering platform scraping 74+ Bangladeshi news sources daily. Features automated GitHub Actions pipelines, daily Kaggle dataset updates, ML-powered analytics (sentiment analysis, topic clustering, breaking news detection), and enterprise infrastructure with Docker/Kubernetes deployment.

caseStudy.problem: Bangladesh lacks a comprehensive, up-to-date news dataset for research and NLP applications, with no automated pipeline for continuous data collection and analysis.
caseStudy.solution: Built a production-grade news aggregation platform with 74+ spiders, automated daily scraping via GitHub Actions, ML-powered analytics, and public Kaggle dataset for the research community.

process.title: Enterprise Scraping
process.desc: Developed 82 spider files with Playwright integration, Cloudflare bypass, rotating proxies, and smart fallback architecture.

process.title: ML Analytics Pipeline
process.desc: Implemented sentiment analysis, TF-IDF topic clustering, breaking news detection via spike analysis, and duplicate detection.

process.title: Automated Infrastructure
process.desc: GitHub Actions daily scraping at 12:00 PM BDT, auto-upload to Kaggle, Docker/Kubernetes deployment, multi-format exports.

process.title: API & Dashboards
process.desc: FastAPI REST + GraphQL endpoints, Streamlit dashboards, Leaflet.js geo-visualization, real-time notifications (Telegram/Slack/Discord).

name: Hotel Management System
desc: Java Swing desktop application with 15 GitHub stars. Features user/admin dashboards, room management, Bkash/Nagad payment integration, and interface-driven modular architecture.

caseStudy.problem: Manual hotel operations (booking, check-in/out) are slow, error-prone, and lack secure payment integration.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a comprehensive Java Swing desktop application with secure user authentication, room management dashboards, and integrated local payment gateways.

process.title: Modular Architecture
process.desc: Adhered to interface-driven design principles to ensure maintainability and scalability.

process.title: Payment Integration
process.desc: Integrated local payment methods (Bkash, Nagad) for seamless financial transactions.

process.title: Security Implementation
process.desc: Built a secure authentication system with signup, login, and password recovery functionality.

name: Android Development Journey
desc: Comprehensive Android learning repository with 54+ structured lessons from beginner to advanced. Covers MVVM architecture, Retrofit, Hilt, RxJava3, Room Database, Firebase, and Paging 3.

name: Solar System Simulation
desc: 3D solar system simulation using OpenGL featuring all planets, moons, real-time orbital animations, texture mapping, and interactive camera controls. Cross-platform with CMake.

name: Pharmacy Management System
desc: C# .NET desktop application with Windows Forms and SQL Server. Features medicine management, sales tracking, inventory control, and user management with Guna UI framework.

name: CVPR - Computer Vision
desc: Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition project using Jupyter Notebook. Explores image processing, face detection, and CNN-based classification techniques.

name: Kotlin Practice
desc: Kotlin learning repository covering fundamentals to advanced features including coroutines, delegation, collections, and Gradle build system with Kotlin DSL.

name: Advent of Code 2024
desc: Algorithmic challenge solutions in Kotlin demonstrating functional programming patterns, list transformations, and sequence validation algorithms.

name: Java Practice Repository
desc: Advanced Java practice covering multithreading, network programming (TCP/UDP), collections, and concurrency patterns including Producer-Consumer and ReentrantLock.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Responsive portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features dark/light theme, scroll animations, PWA support, and dynamic content loading from JSON.
